tasks.name: Speech task
tasks.definition: Participants were required to define nouns presented in the form of colored picture stimuli. They were instructed to generate as much verbal information pertaining to the given object as possible.

tasks.name: Count task
tasks.definition: Participants counted up from 1 at a rate of 1 per second upon seeing the prompt '1...'.

tasks.name: Decision task
tasks.definition: Participants were required to press a button on seeing a target (a blue square) and make no response for a distractor (an orange circle), both of which were presented in equal frequencies in a random order.
